name: Balzak
description:
Balzak is a simple freeroom horror game. The game is called after the thing that chases you. Your goal is to escape and destroy Balzak before he finds you. Can you escape from Balzak?

Game features:

  • Room with bonuses
  • Opportunity to alter the ending
  • Simple inventory system
  • Hidden items and levels

Balzak is inspired by a mascot named Alzak. The game has built in system of hints so you know what to do. Don´t worry, you can still get lost in the tunnel system.
